    1: from numpy._core import multiarray
    2: 
    3: # these must import without warning or error from numpy.core.multiarray to
    4: # support old pickle files
    5: for item in ["_reconstruct", "scalar"]:
    6:     globals()[item] = getattr(multiarray, item)
    7: 
    8: # Pybind11 (in versions <= 2.11.1) imports _ARRAY_API from the multiarray
    9: # submodule as a part of NumPy initialization, therefore it must be importable
   10: # without a warning.
   11: _ARRAY_API = multiarray._ARRAY_API
   12: 
   13: def __getattr__(attr_name):
   14:     from numpy._core import multiarray
   15: 
   16:     from ._utils import _raise_warning
   17:     ret = getattr(multiarray, attr_name, None)
   18:     if ret is None:
   19:         raise AttributeError(
   20:             f"module 'numpy.core.multiarray' has no attribute {attr_name}")
   21:     _raise_warning(attr_name, "multiarray")
   22:     return ret
   23: 
   24: 
   25: del multiarray
